attributes.action: remove partington housing association and its staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: partington greater manchester is a tiny community that has been destroyed by bad management and bad service from our housing association, we cannot accept this any longer and its time we all took a stand on this to create a safer enviroment with an housing association who cares about its residents and can manage itself more better

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
